Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Sure here's a summary in a modern and trendy style without including any additional facts:

Title: People are calling for action from the Federal Government to help combat poverty in Australia. #RaisetheRate is the hashtag that highlights concerns about inadequate payments that keep people stuck in poverty. People who are affected by this report are desperately seeking a change in government policy to help them cover basic expenses.
